verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G379>inexcusable,<s%> <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> thou art that <S%G2919>judgest:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G2919>judgest<s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> thou <S%G2632>condemnest<s%> <S%G4572>thyself;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> thou that <S%G2919>judgest<s%> <S%G4238>doest<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> same <S%G846>things.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we are <S%G1492>sure<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> them which <S%G4238>commit<s%> such <S%G5108>things.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3049>thinkest<s%> thou <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> that <S%G2919>judgest<s%> them which <S%G4238>do<s%> such <S%G5108>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>doest<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> shalt <S%G1628>escape<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2706>despisest<s%> thou <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5544>goodness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G463>forbearance<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering;<s%> not <S%G50>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5543>goodness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>leadeth<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance?<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4643>hardness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G279>impenitent<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> treasurest <S%G2343>up<s%> unto <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the righteous <S%G1341>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> will <S%G591>render<s%> to every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> deeds: <S%G2041><s%>

To them <S%G3303>who<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> patient <S%G5281>continuance<s%> in <S%G18>well<s%> <S%G2041>doing<s%> seek <S%G2212>for<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G861>immortality,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> life: <S%G2222><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> unto them that are <S%G1537>contentious,<s%> <S%G2052><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> do not <S%G544>obey<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> <S%G2372>indignation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3709>wrath,<s%>

Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4730>anguish,<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G2716>doeth<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> of <S%G5037>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> also of the <S%G1672>Gentile;<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> to <S%G5037>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> also to the Gentile: <S%G1672><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> without <S%G460>law<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> without <S%G460>law:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law;<s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G202>hearers<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4163>doers<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G1344>justified.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> contained in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3778>these,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> a <S%G3551>law<s%> unto themselves: <S%G1438><s%>

Which <S%G3748><s%> <S%G1731>show<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1123>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> also bearing <S%G4828>witness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G3053>thoughts<s%> the mean <S%G3342>while<s%> <S%G2723>accusing<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>else<s%> <S%G626>excusing<s%> one <S%G240>another;)<s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>

Behold, <S%G2396><s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> art <S%G2028>called<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> restest <S%G1879>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> makest thy <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> his <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1381>approvest<s%> the things that are more <S%G1308>excellent,<s%> being <S%G2727>instructed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law;<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> art <S%G3982>confident<s%> that thou <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G1511>art<s%> a <S%G3595>guide<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> a <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G3588>them<s%> which are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%>

An <S%G3810>instructor<s%> of the <S%G878>foolish,<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of <S%G3516>babes,<s%> which <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>

Thou therefore which <S%G1321>teachest<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> <S%G1321>teachest<s%> thou <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4572>thyself?<s%> thou that <S%G2784>preachest<s%> a man should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal,<s%> dost thou <S%G2813>steal?<s%>

Thou that <S%G3004>sayest<s%> a man should <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> dost thou commit <S%G3431>adultery?<s%> thou that <S%G948>abhorrest<s%> <S%G1497>idols,<s%> dost thou commit <S%G2416>sacrilege?<s%>

Thou <S%G3739>that<s%> makest thy <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3847>breaking<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G818>dishonorest<s%> thou <S%G2316>God?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G5623>profiteth,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G4238>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou be a <S%G3848>breaker<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> shall <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> be <S%G3049>counted<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> shall not <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> which is <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G5449>nature,<s%> if it <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> who <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> dost <S%G3848>transgress<s%> the <S%G3551>law?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> which is one <S%G1722>outwardly;<s%> <S%G5318><s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> is that <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> which is <S%G1722>outward<s%> <S%G5318><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> he is a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> which is one <S%G1722>inwardly;<s%> <S%G2927><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is that of the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G3756>not<s%> in the <S%G1121>letter;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>
